title: HCLTech integrates its GenAI platform with Google Gemini
description: HCL Technologies announced the availability of its GenAI platform, HCLTech AI Force, on Google Cloud's Gemini models, integrating Google's large language model to drive innovation at scale.
content: IT services company HCL Technologies (HCLTech) on Thursday announced that its GenAI platform -- HCLTech AI Force -- is available on Google Cloud's Gemini models. HCLTech's system-agnostic GenAI platform, which is geared to fast-track the value of GenAI investments, has integrated Google's multimodal large language model (LLM) Gemini to spur innovation at scale, the Noida-headquartered company said in a release.
